attributes.action: tell the banks to go and whistle !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any bank that has received any money from the tax payer should be told that NO bonuses shall be paid to staff until all loans have been paid back. They should think themselves lucky they have a job and treat THAT as a bonus !

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
